title: America�s Central Bank: The History and Structure of the Federal Reserve
content: Figure 5.  William Jennings Bryan, Democratic Party presidential candidate, 1896  Source: William Robinson Leigh, Artist’s Conception of William Jennings Bryan after the Cross of Gold Speech at the 1896 Democratic National Convention,  McClure’s Magazine, April 1900, p. 535.
